name: Baby Shark Universe
description: Baby Shark Universe is a metaverse platform based on the IMX ecosystem. Our vision is to establish a true metaverse ecosystem for users. Through this project, we aim to change the way we interact with the virtual world based on a user-friendly gaming environment. Baby Shark Universe aspires to become a safe, decentralized, and transparent blockchain platform based on blockchain technology and immersive user interface of both 2D and 3D games.
